channel.title: Can someone convert my file from .swf to .fla please
channel.description: If I give someone a .swf file can you please convert it to .fla? Because I tried some programs but cant get them to work since I dont got the full versions of any of them. SORRY MESSED UP POST I MENT CAN SOMEONE CHANGE .FLA TO .SWF

item.title: Can someone convert my file from .swf to .fla please
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

[quote=“anon95490785, post:1, topic:11603”][quote author=kloplop321 link=topic=17152.msg194584#msg194584 date=1156843555]
dude that is technicaly impossible, the fla consists of everything that in suncompressed or is compressed, you would have to decompile it somehow, but flash doesn’t work that way so good luck on that, macromedia made it so you can’t do that so people don’t steal other people’s flash’s
[/quote]

You are retarded, don’t talk like you know what your saying because you don’t.
Search around for a program called Sothink flash decompiler. It’s easy to use and stuff. Sometimes actionscript will not get exported properly but in most cases it is fine. A serial number is always easy to find for the program, try www.serials.ws[/quote]

Unfortunately, it uses online activation so you a cracked serial won’t help you here.

Read full topic
